devdoc.author: NFTfi
devdoc.details: Registry for partners permitted for reciving a revenue share. Each partner's address is associated with the percent of the admin fee shared.

params.revenueShareInBasisPoints: - The percent (measured in basis points) of the admin fee amount that will be taken as a revenue share for a the partner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

requestTransferOwnership(address).details: Requests transferring ownership of the contract to a new account (`_newOwnerCandidate`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._revenueShareInBasisPoints: - The percent (measured in basis points) of the admin fee amount that will be taken as a revenue share for a the partner.

devdoc.title: PermittedPartners

PartnerRevenueShare(address,uint16).notice: This event is fired whenever the admin sets a partner's revenue share.

constructor.notice: Sets the admin of the contract.

getPartnerPermit(address).notice: This function can be called by anyone to get the revenue share parcent associated with the partner.

setPartnerRevenueShare(address,uint16).notice: This function can be called by admins to change the revenue share status of a partner. This includes adding an partner to the revenue share list, removing it and updating the revenue share percent.
